songs.title: Blood From a Stone
songs.lyrics:
[Produced by Zane Lowe]

[Intro]
I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to
I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to
I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to
I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to

[Link 1]
Impossible's possible
I know cause I lost it all
I know the price of my ego is lethal
I still got their hearts for you

[Verse 1]
You feel like nobody's catching you
Start acting irrational
Stop taking my lead
I'm a fiend and I feel like I need a sabbatical
Impossible's possible
It feels like they're watching you
I know the price of my ego is lethal
I still got their hearts for you
I still got their hearts for you
I still got their hearts for you
Impossible's possible
I got the hearts

[Verse 2]
Living in a safe house, never existed
Too many lips to kiss
Cooking at the steak house, should have persisted
Makes you wanna slit your wrist, so you clench your fist
Like a mentalist, enter abyss, should I mention this?
Coalition formed and it's yellow-blue, never true
Nobody gave a shit
Least you know my parade
Sticking on a masquerade
Sitting in a waste of space
Whilst sipping on a case of basic, tasteless lemonade
Kiss your life away, wish your life away
What's the wifey say?
Time to hibernate
Hyperventilate, it's ten to eight
Never gonna make the train

[Link 2 x2]
Searching for an El Dorado
Hiding from a false bravado
Feeling like we won the lotto, oh no

Impossible's possible

[Hook]
Blood
Blood from a stone
And love isn't home
Can you sense from my tone?
Getting to me's like getting blood from a stone
I used to get in the zone
I had to leave it alone
Forgetting the long and the nights
And the fights to get some blood from a stone

[Link 2]

[Hook]

[Link 1]

[Outro]
I still got their hearts for you
I still got their hearts for you
Impossible's possible
I got the hearts
